name: iOwO
description:
/* This is a local coop game made for Mini Jam 20 */

/* Theme: Music */ /* Limitation: 0w0 */

Compete for points by scoring goals in the most dangerous place, Space!! Fight to the Rhythm of tech-beats as you try to out-wit and out-maneuver your opponent!! Watch out for the opposite color as it kills!!

Blu Controls

  • S - Launch
  • D -Boost

Orng Controls

  • L - Launch
  • K - Boost
